description: Uploads an image layer part to Amazon ECR. When an image is pushed, each new image layer is uploaded in parts. The maximum size of each image layer part can be 20971520 bytes (or about 20MB). The UploadLayerPart API is called once per each new image layer part.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository to which you are uploading layer parts.

parameters.name: uploadId
parameters.description: The upload ID from a previous  InitiateLayerUpload operation to associate with the layer part upload.

parameters.name: partFirstByte
parameters.description: The position of the first byte of the layer part witin the overall image layer.

parameters.name: partLastByte
parameters.description: The position of the last byte of the layer part within the overall image layer.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name associated with the request.

nested_items.name: uploadId
nested_items.description: The upload ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: lastByteReceived
nested_items.description: The integer value of the last byte received in the request.
